segments.text: I ’ m afraid we are really short staffed this week , Mr . Cranial . I ’ d like to accommodate you , but I just don ’ t think I ’ ll have the time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you telling me you ’ re not going to meet with me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not at all , sir . I ’ d just like to push it up to next week . I ’ ll have a lot more free time at the beginning of next week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I don ’ t like it , but I guess I don ’ t have any choice .
segments.speaker: S2
